DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study design determine relationship intra-myocellular lipid muscle contractility fiber obese non-obese older adult . Obese participant recruit on-going weight loss intervention study application seek approval recruit enroll lean comparison group non-obese older adult . The primary goal study characterize contractile property single muscle fiber whole muscle healthy , non-obese individual record condition investigator use obese population begin determine whether fat infiltration account diminish force .
DOC.criteria: Age=6575 year BMI=1824 kg/m2 No resistance training past 6 month Normal cognitive function ( MMSE > 24 ) No contraindication participation weight loss weight lift exercise include severe arthritis musculoskeletal disorder , knee hip replacement spinal surgery past year Able provide transportation study visit Not involve research study involve strength training undergoing physical therapy Not dependent cane walker Willing provide inform consent Weight loss gain ( Â±5 % ) past 6 month Body mass > 136 kg ( DXA limit ) Current smoker ( No nicotine within past year ) evidence alcohol drug abuse Insulin dependent uncontrolled diabetes ( FBG > 140 mg/dL ) Uncontrolled hypertension ( BP > 180/100 mmHg ) Abnormal kidney function liver blood test Serious conduction disorder ( e.g. , 3rd degree heart block ) , uncontrolled arrhythmia , new Q wave STsegment depression ( > 2 mm ) ECG Past current cardiovascular disease , include uncontrolled angina dysrhythmia , hypertrophic cardiomyopathy , congestive heart failure , PAD , stroke , history myocardial infarction , use defibrillator major heart surgery , deep vein thrombosis pulmonary embolus . These review case case basis . Past current respiratory disease ( require steroid treatment supplemental oxygen ) Past current clinical diagnosis neurological hematological disease Use medication could influence study variable ( growth/steroid hormone , prescription antiinflammatory medication , beta blocker , Coumadin blood thinner , include Plavix , Ticid , Aggrenox ) Cancer require treatment past 2 year , except nonmelanoma skin cancer Clinically evident edema anemia
